mapper.update: update comments set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, topic_id = #{topicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, text = #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, likes = #{likes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ip_address = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARBINARY}, voters = #{voters,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, topic_id, created, text, author, email, likes, ip_address, voters from comments where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, parent_id, topic_id, created, text, author, email, likes, ip_address, voters from comments
